content: करंब, करंबित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृ-अंबच्; <ls>Uṇ. 4. 82</ls>] {@--1@} Mixed, intermingled, variegated; प्रकाममादित्यमवाप्य कंटकैः करंबितामोदभरं विवृण्वती <ls>N. 1. 115</ls>, <ls n="N. 1.">85</ls>; स्फुटतरफेनकदंबकरंबितमिव यमुनाजलपूरं <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Set, inlaid.

करंभः(बः) {@--1@} Flour or meal mixed with curds. {@--2@} Mud; करंभवालुकातापान् <ls>Ms. 12. 76</ls> (where the word is variously interpreted; but Medhātithi takes it to mean ‘mud’). {@--3@} Groats or coarsely ground oats. {@--4@} A mixed odour.
